description: This file defines API route handlers for authentication endpoints (/register and /login) using FastAPI. It handles user registration and login, interacts with a database via SQLAlchemy, and manages JWT token generation.

classes.name: User
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a user in the database.

classes.name: UserRole
classes.description: Enumeration defining possible user roles (e.g., rider, driver).

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Schema representing the response containing the access token.

methods.name: TokenResponse register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to register a new user and return a JWT token.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to authenticate a user and return a JWT token.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/
